summary: An ordinance relating to, and providing for the payment of the cost and expense of the condemnation of North 70th Street, from Greenwood Avenue to Fremont Avenue; of North 71st Street, from Dayton Avenue to Fremont Avenue; and of Dayton Avenue, from North 70th Street to North 72nd Street, as provided in Ordinance No. 42799 of said City, by the issuance and sale of bonds of the district created to pay therefor.
